data.body: This is the first test message. Don't think too much about it.

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Proin tincidunt, nisl rutrum lacinia laoreet, magna risus commodo lacus, eu porttitor urna purus ac nunc. Cras volutpat mi at iaculis sagittis. Nam convallis sit amet purus at lobortis. Pellentesque suscipit pellentesque elementum. Proin vitae consequat leo. Interdum et malesuada fames ac ante ipsum primis in faucibus. Praesent dui libero, feugiat ac augue vel, posuere pharetra elit. Proin et quam quis velit commodo imperdiet non non augue.

In sit amet arcu nec sapien placerat sollicitudin ac vitae neque. 

With love from,
Admin
I sent you an empty letter cuz I'm an ahole. Lets hope it breaks everything!

data.optional_recipient:
To the jerk Jotain
In Hell
data.body:
Dear Jotain, you are indeed an ahole. But unlucky for you the empty letter didn't break anything. Tough luck!

Try again and I won't be so nice. (don't try again)

Yours,
Admin

Dear Admin,

Thank you for using me as a tester. I love it. I do feel used but I guess thats the life of a tester, right? Or maybe I should sue you for a lot of money. I'll think about it.

Cya later,
With love, Jotain

Hello Jotain, just letting you know you sent the previous letter TWICE! Only send letters once next time, thanks.

(Don't let it happen again, I'm serious!)

Yours,
Admin
